body: A fix for this should include a test that fails if any resource [here](https://github.com/helm/helm/blob/main/pkg/chartutil/create.go) receives a deprecation warning.
@joejulian I am interested in this issue,  may i take it?

issue.title: Fix hpa

repository.name: mastodon-helm-chart
repository.description: Example helm chart to run mastodon

license.name: GNU Affero General Public License v3.0

issue.body: The HorizonalPodAutoscaler sample that is generated by `helm create` is old and no longer works with Kubernetes 1.25 (see https://github.com/helm/helm/issues/11495). This fixes that template.

body:
> > A fix for this should include a test that fails if any resource [here](https://github.com/helm/helm/blob/main/pkg/chartutil/create.go) receives a deprecation warning.
> 
> @joejulian   It's hard to judge a resource rendered by a helm manifest is deprecated or not. it was affected by the version of users' k8s .we should handle it like ingress.
> https://github.com/helm/helm/blob/3974136b6eba92f17a821aac52a80b59a9fa1202/pkg/chartutil/create.go#L223-L229
> @hzliangbin  If you are too busy to fix it, I'd like to do it for you :-) 

True, but for testing purposes we can use the [linter deprecations](https://github.com/helm/helm/blob/main/pkg/lint/rules/deprecations.go).

> True, but for testing purposes we can use the [linter deprecations](https://github.com/helm/helm/blob/main/pkg/lint/rules/deprecations.go).

[linter deprecations](https://github.com/helm/helm/blob/main/pkg/lint/rules/deprecations.go) depends on LDFLAGS `k8sVersionMinor `  which is not set when test uint case, it's 1.20 by default. it will lead to `autoscaling/v2beta1` is not regarded as deprecated.
https://github.com/helm/helm/blob/7838fb769d00f53c858d994a873f42c2960a7d25/pkg/lint/rules/deprecations.go#L30-L34
If we set ldflags when testing , `helm template` test case may face faill because of template 's annotation is diff from k8s version 
https://github.com/helm/helm/blob/21e694e0f9575700f16f6c87002c6ccdc434edc4/cmd/helm/testdata/output/template-show-only-multiple.txt#L10-L12

we can also set the variate `k8sVersionMinor `  and all "helm template" 's output to version 25. it case that we should keep the variate `k8sVersionMinor`  same with the version of `k8s.io` package which we used.

Is there a plan to have the best of both worlds?

PS: it means some currenct test cases may have bugs, because of  Fixed variate `k8sVersionMinor=20`

> > True, but for testing purposes we can use the [linter deprecations](https://github.com/helm/helm/blob/main/pkg/lint/rules/deprecations.go).
> 
> [linter deprecations](https://github.com/helm/helm/blob/main/pkg/lint/rules/deprecations.go) depends on LDFLAGS `k8sVersionMinor ` which is not set when test uint case, it's 1.20 by default. it will lead to `autoscaling/v2beta1` is not regarded as deprecated.
> 
> https://github.com/helm/helm/blob/7838fb769d00f53c858d994a873f42c2960a7d25/pkg/lint/rules/deprecations.go#L30-L34

My intention was always to come back at this and make those override-able with a cli flag.

> My intention was always to come back at this and make those override-able with a cli flag.

I have a few question about it, how to do it when testing? and what's the content in test case about it ?
https://github.com/helm/helm/blob/21e694e0f9575700f16f6c87002c6ccdc434edc4/cmd/helm/testdata/output/template-show-only-multiple.txt#L10-L12
